name: Fridge Goblin
description:
Horizontal movement A and D, space is jump. Left Click to activate powerup.

In this tiny platformer you control a Fridge Goblin. Your goal is to climb the inside of a fridge with the help of different powerups and eat the pighead.

This is my first game that is closest to completion. The game still in development heavily.

Soon will be added: more levels, updated assets, sounds fx, vfx, more pickups, hazards, an overall polish to the game, so check back sometimes  :D

Asset packs used as placeholders:

https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-food

https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack
